author: brane
msg: If plaintext password storage is disabled by configuration, then basic_test #48
(basic_auth_test) fails over DAV because it expects to be able to save credentials
between successive commands in non-interactive mode.
via DAV and plaintext password storage is disabled.
svn_private_config.h; however, it should eventually get information

author: gordonsmith
msg: Falcon: Added feature tests for <HTTPService>/<request>, <RemoteObject>/<method>, and <WebService>/<operation> tags.
Added Javadoc explaining how these tags differ from ordinary instance tags.
Feature tests can now optionally compile against various Flex SWCs, and can add additional namespaces to the MXML.
